p: A divergence tree was created based on the single-copy homologous genes of the following species: Homo sapiens (human), Macaca mulatta (rhesus macaque), Sus scrofa (domestic pig), Tadarida brasiliensis (bat), Oryctolagus cuniculus (rabbit), Mus musculus (mouse) and Rattus norvegicus (rat) using the OrthoMCL v2.0 ( http://orthomcl.org/orthomcl/), Muscle ( https://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/msa/muscle/), PHYML v3.0 ( http://www.atgc-montpellier.fr/phyml/), and MCMCTree v4.4 ( http://abacus.gene.ucl.ac.uk/software/paml.html) software.
